questions.name: money_q1
questions.prompt: Analyze the provided text. Determine if its primary subject is about financial transactions, budgeting, loans, investments, or any other activity directly related to monetary or capital management.

questions.name: money_q2
questions.prompt: Does the text contain specific amounts, currency designators (â‚¬, $), or references to payment methods?

questions.name: q_coding_assistant
questions.prompt:
Is the primary subject about the impact of AI coding assistants on developer productivity?
The article must discuss research, user experience, case studies, or opinions regarding how AI tools (such as GitHub Copilot, Amazon CodeWhisperer, or similar code suggestion/generation technologies) affect one or more of the following: developer speed, efficiency, code quality, time-to-market, or the overall rate of code completion.

questions.name: q_health
questions.prompt: Assess whether the content includes medical advice, symptom descriptions, treatment plans, or references to healthcare providers. Is it related to physical or mental health?
